data.eml:eml: New species and new records of Tingidae (Insecta: Heteroptera) from Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guilbert, Eric, Pham, Hong Thai, Soulier-Perkins, Adeline (2018): New species and new records of Tingidae (Insecta: Heteroptera) from Vietnam. Zootaxa 4387 (3): 591-600, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4387.3.11
